name: tabula
description: My first iteration of a keyboard.

scripts.ergogen:watch: nodemon --ext .js,.yaml --watch ergogen/footprints --watch ergogen/config.yml --exec npm run ergogen:build
scripts.zmk:update: docker compose -f zmk/docker-compose.yml run --rm firmware-env zmk-update
scripts.zmk:build: docker compose -f zmk/docker-compose.yml run --rm firmware-env zmk-build

author: Mitchell Johnstone
